analysis.key_quote: Reclassifying federal employees as at-will political appointees would not only degrade the quality of public service but also reintroduce a modern-day spoils system, fostering corruption and eroding public trust in government institutions.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed Schedule F rule, highlighting concerns about undermining the merit-based civil service system and the potential for politicization, which aligns with the themes of integrity and nonpartisan governance.
